trans-unit.source: distance to the border in pixels in the direction of width/X
trans-unit.target: distance to the border in pixels in the direction of width/X

trans-unit.source: if true, the txPositionWidth is relative to the right border
trans-unit.target: if true, the txPositionWidth is relative to the right border

trans-unit.source: distance to the border in pixels in the direction of height/Y
trans-unit.target: distance to the border in pixels in the direction of height/Y

trans-unit.source: if true, the txPositionHeight is relative to the bottom border
trans-unit.target: if true, the txPositionHeight is relative to the bottom border

trans-unit.source: overlap of speech-bubble in direction of top
trans-unit.target: overlap of speech-bubble in direction of top

trans-unit.source: overlap of speech-bubble in direction of right
trans-unit.target: overlap of speech-bubble in direction of right

trans-unit.source: overlap of speech-bubble in direction of bottom
trans-unit.target: overlap of speech-bubble in direction of bottom

trans-unit.source: overlap of speech-bubble in direction of left
trans-unit.target: overlap of speech-bubble in direction of left
